text: * Consider joining R(4, B) and S(B, C) * map: (a,b) = <b, (R,a)>for (a,b) inR (b,c) = <b, (S,c)>for (b,c)inS * reduce: « each key b will be associated to a list of pairs each of the form (R, a) or (S, ¢) « Construct all triples (a, b, c) where (R, a) and (S, ¢) are associated to key b * These triples are your values and the keys are irrelevant
